name: ALTERED AXIS
description:
MADE IN 48 HOURS FO THE 8 BITS TO INFINITY 36# -  MOUSE JAM.

CONTROLS:

MOVE LEFT - LMB

MOVE RIGHT - RMB

MOVE UP - SCROLL UP (MOUSE WHEEL UP) 

MOVE DOWN - SCROLL  DOWN (MOUSE WHEEL DOWN) 

CREDITS:

Programming, Art, Sound, Design by Cyril-Devon (Retrobrain)

Many thanks to my brother for helping me playtest (and correct) the game!

Some assets used in the projects:

-Kenney Assets (Some Sprites and sfx)

-Phased Fonts from 1001 fonts
